title: Register as a Donor
desc: Create your account by filling in your details including blood group, location, and contact information.

title: Search or Receive Requests
desc: Find donors near you or view blood requests created by recipients and volunteers.

title: Schedule Donation
desc: Choose a convenient date, time, and location to donate blood. Confirm your availability.

title: Donate & Save Lives
desc: Visit the hospital or donation center and complete your donation to help those in need.

title: Track Your Impact
desc: Keep track of your donations, view your contribution stats, and help build a healthier community.
